review_title: Great Chemical Company Needing Power Electrical Engineers
job_title: Senior Relay Protection and Power Systems Engineer in Freeport, TX
pros: The Dow Chemical Freeport Site has just about everything a Power Electrical Engineer could want.  It is the largest Power Generation, Transmission and Distribution complex of its type in the entire world.
cons: The company's Chemical Engineers and Business Types often forget that they are also in the Power Business, and therefore sometimes forget to embrace the need for highly qualified Power Electrical Engineers.  Basically there are no chemicals produced without reliable electrical power and steam.
